newsitem.title: USA: Endorex in interim financing agreement.
newsitem.headline: Endorex in interim financing agreement.

text.p: Endorex Corp, which is developing drugs to treat and prevent cancer and infectious diseases, said Friday it secured interim financing from two of its major stockholders in return for warrants to buy Endorex stock.
The agreement will cover funding while Endorex completes a previously announced equity private placement.

Under an agreement with Aries Funds, Endorex said it may initially borrow up to $500,000 and potentially may borrow up to an additional $500,000 on the same terms. Endorex said it issued Aries Funds warrants to purchase Endorex common stock.
Endorex said the funds will be used for clinical drug development programs.
